author: Pamela Muse
text:
San Mateo County, CA is embarking on an endeavor to restructure our staffing model to ensure that it is both fiscally sustainable as well as agile enough to respond effectively to the pace of change.  Our focus is broad and includes examining different types of employee relationships, including fixed term, contract, temporary, volunteers, etc.  We would greatly appreciate your agency completing a brief, 5 minute survey to inform us about your organization’s staffing practices and I will follow up directly with those that respond. 
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/AgileWorkforce2012 
Thanks so much!
Donna
Donna J. Vaillancourt
Human Resources Director
(650) 363-4132
dvaillancourt@smcgov.org
title: Restructure Staffing Models Survey
